subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Curlin, the 2007 Horse of the Year in the United States, overpowered an international field on Saturday to win the $6 million Dubai World Cup, the world’s richest horse race.
snippet: Curlin, the 2007 Horse of the Year in the United States, overpowered an international field on Saturday to win the $6 million Dubai World Cup, the world’s richest horse race.
